data: {"generalSituation":"A winter monsoon will reach the coast of Guangdong later tomorrow, the weather will become cold over the region in the following couple of days. It will be fine and very dry with rather large temperature difference between day and night. With the monsoon moderating slightly, temperatures will rise slightly over southern China during the weekend to early next week, the weather will be persistently fine, but it will still be cool in the morning.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260105","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 3, becoming north force 4 to 5.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine.
